resources.string: Pastry with Cream and Forest Fruits

Restaurant with panoramic view on the enchanting Gulf of Petrosino offering the possibility to taste the dishes of Neapolitan cuisine, made of fragrant aromas and delicious fragrances, and with a careful selection of national and international dishes. 
SMALL BREAKFAST Breakfast is BUFFET STYLE with a wide choice between sweet and savory, from 7:00 to 10:00. On request, order at the reception or in the restaurant, a small breakfast bag. 
DINNER Dinner with a choice menu is served from 6:45 pm to 9:00 pm. 
Custom menus for customers with special needs. 
Gentlemen are invited to wear LONG PANTS. 
ALL DRINKS ordered at the restaurant must be consumed during dinner.

Lounge bar overlooking the unforgettable Gulf of Petrosino, proposing a unique tasting experience among the distinctive flavors of traditional and innovative cocktails. Created with the intention of awakening the senses and accompanied by a careful selection of national and international drinks. 
APERITIF The aperitif is served from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm, with a wide selection of sweet and savory snacks. On request, it is possible to order a takeaway aperitif at the bar or at the reception. 
BAR HOURS The bar is open from 10:00 am to 12:00 am, providing a continuous beverage and snack service. 
Custom menus available for customers with specific needs. 
ALL DRINKS ordered at the bar must be consumed during the stay.

Panoramic sauna overlooking the fascinating Gulf of Petrosino, offering a total wellness experience through heat and aromas. The environment is characterized by a modern design and a careful selection of wellness programs, both traditional and international. 
SAUNA HOURS The sauna is open from 10:00 am to 8:00 pm, with the possibility of booking private sessions. On request, you can order a personalized wellness package at the reception. 
CUSTOM PROGRAMS Personalized sauna programs are available for guests with special needs or preferences. 
Gentlemen are invited to respect the SAUNA RULES. 
ALL TREATMENTS AND SERVICES ordered must be consumed during the stay.

Swimming pool with panoramic view of the fascinating Gulf of Petrosino, offering a relaxation and fun experience immersed in crystal clear water. The pool is framed by an aesthetic design and is equipped with comfortable deck chairs and umbrellas. 
POOL HOURS The swimming pool is open from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm, allowing guests to enjoy a refreshing swim or relax in the sun. 
POOL SNACK BAR On request, you can order a snack service with a selection of snacks and drinks at the reception or directly at the pool. 
POOL ACTIVITIES We organize water aerobics sessions and personalized swimming courses for guests with special needs or preferences. 
Gentlemen are invited to wear APPROPRIATE SWIMWEAR.

Dedicated dog care service, designed to guarantee the maximum comfort and attention to your four-legged friend throughout the stay. We provide a wide range of services, including personalized activities, games and grooming treatments. 
AVAILABILITY The dog care service is available 24 hours a day, to ensure continuous assistance for your pet throughout the stay. 
DOG CARE PACKAGES On request, you can organize a personalized dog care package at the reception, suitable for the needs of your furry friend. 
PERSONALIZED TREATMENTS Personalized treatments are available for dogs with special needs or preferences.

Relaxation area where fun meets nostalgia. Enjoy a variety of 90s video games, challenge your friends to a pool game, immerse yourself in a ping pong match or relax with one of our many board games. An ideal place to relax, socialize and have fun. 
AVAILABILITY The relaxation area is open 24 hours a day, allowing you to enjoy your free time whenever you prefer during your stay. 
ACTIVITIES A variety of activities are available, including pool tables, ping pong, board games and a selection of vintage video games. 
CUSTOMIZATIONS On request, you can organize personalized game tournaments or events at the reception.

Attentive and professional laundry service, ready to meet all your cleaning and garment care needs. We have a wide range of options, from general laundry to delicate washing, drying and ironing service. \nLAUNDRY HOURS The laundry service is available 24 hours a day, to ensure continuous support throughout the stay. \nEXPRESS SERVICE On request, we offer an express service for last minute inconveniences, guaranteeing a quick washing, drying and ironing for your garments.

Our library located in the lobby offers a wide range of books for your reading pleasure. Whether you prefer novels, essays, thrillers or childrenâ€™s books, we have something for all tastes. 
LIBRARY HOURS The library is accessible 24 hours a day, allowing you to choose a book at any time during your stay. 
FREE READING All books are available for free reading during the stay, offering a relaxing way to pass the time or immerse yourself in a new adventure. 
PERSONALIZED SERVICE On request, our staff can help you choose a book that matches your interests or reading needs. 
Please respect the LIBRARY RULES to ensure a pleasant experience for all our guests. 
ALL BORROWED BOOKS must be returned before departure.
